detailedDescription:
Prop Trader Pro
The All-in-One Prop Trading Operating System: Plan, Execute, Analyze, Improve

Prop Trader Pro is a complete prop trading operating system built around a structured self-improvement loop:

Plan → Execute → Analyze → Improve

At the center of that loop are three specialized modules designed to work together as a single performance engine:

♦ Dr.Markets = The Planner
♦ TradeRx = The Executor
♦ JournalX = The Daily Journal Writer
